element.headline: Dramatic Beauty in the North West

BEBaseFoundation.hdlPageTitle: Dramatic Beauty in the North West
BEBaseFoundation.stf_NavTitle: Dramatic Beauty in the North West
BEBaseFoundation.stf_PageTitle: Dramatic Beauty in the North West

BELayoutT8.stf_Title: Dramatic Beauty in the North West

BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Day 1: Arrival Day. Welcome sunset drinks at Okari Tree Lawn at Cable Beach followed by a Taste of Broome dinner at Buddha’s Sanctuary, Cable Beach Club Resort & Spa.

Day 2: Today, an introduction to the fascinating pearling industry of Broome. Take a short journey to Western Australia’s multi award winning ‘Willie Creek Pearl Farm’ where you will be warmly welcomed by your hosts. Discover how the rare and beautiful ‘Australian South Sea Pearl’ is produced. During the morning, half of the group will be given a live demonstration on how the seeds are planted into the live oyster shell while the other half enjoys a delightful and informative cruise along Willie Creek. Later, relax in the gorgeous surroundings for a sumptuous lunch.

After lunch groups will swap over for the demonstration and cruise followed by a tempting look at the pearl jewellery created by Willie Creek's in-house jewellers.

This evening’s dinner will be at the beautiful outdoor venue of ‘The Pearl Luggers’ in Chinatown. Enjoy an evening under the stars with entertainment provided by local bands.

Day 3: After an early breakfast, you will be collected for an exhilarating scenic flight over the Buccaneer Archipelago. This adventure will include a stop at Cape Leveque for a quick swim and morning tea and then back onboard to experience the 10 metre tides of the Horizontal Waterfalls, the islands of the Buccaneer Archipelago and the pearl farms in Talbot Bay.

Lunch will be at Matso’s, the Kimberley’s multi award winning microbrewery where you will be greeted by their German Master Brewer for a tasting session.

Tonight’s gala dinner will be held at Sun Pictures, the world’s oldest operating picture gardens and a unique Broome experience.

Day 4: Departure day. Rest and relax around the resort or take one last stroll along Cable Beach.
